channel.title: CVE Feed for ISC -- BIND 9
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ISC -- BIND 9

item.title: CVE-2023-2911|2023-06-21T16:26:36.587Z -- isc -- bind%209
item.description: If the `recursive-clients` quota is reached on a BIND 9 resolver configured with both `stale-answer-enable yes;` and `stale-answer-client-timeout 0;`, a sequence of serve-stale-related lookups could cause `named` to loop and terminate unexpectedly due to a stack overflow. This issue affects BIND 9 versions 9.16.33 through 9.16.41, 9.18.7 through 9.18.15, 9.16.33-S1 through 9.16.41-S1, and 9.18.11-S1 through 9.18.15-S1.
